items.name: Ollie
items.description: First trick to learn. Foundation for everything else. Done by popping tail and sliding your front foot up to level out the board.

items.name: Backside Shuvit
items.description: Scoop back foot back to rotate the board 180 degrees.

items.name: Frontside Shuvit
items.description: Scoop back foot forward to rotate the board 180 degrees

items.name: Backside 180
items.description: Scoop back foot back to rotate the board 180 degrees while turning your body in the same direction.

items.name: Frontside 180
items.description: Scoop back foot forward to rotate the board 180 degrees while turning your body in the same direction.

items.name: Kickflip
items.description: Pop the same as you would an ollie but slide your front foot up angled and flick your toe off the heel side of the nose

items.name: Heelflip
items.description: Pop the same as you would an ollie but slide your front foot up angled and flick your heel off the toe side of the nose

items.name: Varial Kickflip
items.description: Combination of a kickflip and backside shuvit. Scoop the tail similar to a backside shuvit and flick off the heel side of the board as it scoops.

items.name: Hardflip
items.description: Combination of a frontside shuvit and kickflip. However, the front shuvit is usual more popped than scooped. Pop an ollie with a slight frontsite scoop. Flick up and straight back in the direction your heel is pointing, leaving enough room for the board to flip inbetween your legs.

items.name: Inward Heelflip
items.description: Combination of a backside shuvit and heelflip. However, the back shuvit is usually more popped than scooped. Pop an ollie with a slight backside scoop. Flick up and straight forward in the direction your toes are pointing, leaving enough room for the board to flip inbetween your legs.

items.name: Varial Heelflip
items.description: Combination of a heelflip and frontside shuvit. Scoop the tail similar to a frontside shuvit and flick of the toe side of the board as it scoops.

items.name: Backside Flip
items.description: Combination of a kickflip and backside 180. Pop and rotate your arms and body similar to a backside 180. While your body turns, flick off the nose similar to a kickflip and varial kickflip.

items.name: Frontside Flip
items.description: Combination of a kickflip and frontside 180. Pop and rotate your arms and body similar to a frontside 180. While your body turns, flick off the nose similar to a kickflip and hardflip.

items.name: Backside Heelflip
items.description: Combination of a heelflip and backside 180. Pop and rotate your arms and body similar to a backside 180. While your body turns, flick off the nose similar to a heelflip and inward heelflip.

items.name: Frontside Heelflip
items.description: Combination of a heelflip and frontside 180. Pop and rotate your arms and body similar to a frontside 180. While your body turns, flick off the nose similar to a heelflip and varial heelflip.

items.name: Backside 360
items.description: Pop and scoop hard similar to the scoop of a backside 360 shuvit. Rotate your arms and body quicker than you would for a backside 180. Keep shoulders level to stay balanced after spinning.

items.name: Frontside 360
items.description: Pop and scoop hard similar to the scoop of a frontside 360 shuvit. Rotate your arms and body quicker than you would for a frontside 180. Keep shoulders level to stay balanced after spinning.

items.name: Backside 360 Shuvit
items.description: Pop and scoop similar to a backside shuvit but with more power. If necessary, use either your front or backfoot to keep the board from flipping.

items.name: Frontside 360 Shuvit
items.description: Pop and scoop similar to a frontside shuvit but with more power. If necessary, use your front foot to keep the board from flipping.

items.name: Backside Bigspin
items.description: Combination of a backside 180 and backside 360 shuvit. Rotate your arms and body similar to a backside 180 while popping and scooping similar to a backside 360 shuvit.

items.name: Frontside Bigspin
items.description: Combination of a frontside 180 and frontside 360 shuvit. Rotate your arms and body similar to a frontside 180 while popping and scooping similar to a frontside 360 shuvit.

items.name: Tre Flip
items.description: Combination of a backside 360 shuvit and kickflip. Pop and scoop similar to a backside 360 shuvit. Then flick off the heel side of the board as it spins like you would for a varial kickflip.

items.name: Lazer Flip
items.description: Combination of a frontside 360 shuvit and heelflip. Pop and scoop similar to a frontside 360 shuvit. Then flick off the toe side of the board as it spins like you would for a varial heelflip

items.name: Big Flip
items.description: Combination of a tre flip and backside 180. Rotate your arms and body similar to a backside bigspin. Then flick off the heel side of the board similar to a tre flip.

items.name: Big Heel
items.description: Combination of a lazer flip and frontside 180. Rotate your arms and body similar to a frontside bigspin. Then flick off the toe side of the board similar to a lazer flip.
